    Calculate extreme shifts

    calc_extreme_shifts.Rd

    calc_extreme_shifts is used to calculate the minimum and maximum shifts, whilst preserving the criteria that at least min_num_overlapping_points are being compared from both accessions.

    calc_extreme_shifts(
  mean_df,
  min_num_overlapping_points,
  shift_extreme,
  accession_data_to_transform,
  accession_data_ref
)

    Arguments

    mean_df

    Input dataframe containing data to transform and reference data.

    min_num_overlapping_points

    Bound the extreme allowed shifts, such than at least this many timepoints are being compared for both accessions.

    shift_extreme

    Approximation of maximum and minimum shifts allowed.

    accession_data_to_transform

    Accession name of data which will be transformed.

    accession_data_ref

    Accession name of reference data.

    Value

    Minimum and maximum values of shifts.
